TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上繪製一個資料列之前，就會發生事件控制項。The event occurs before a row is painted on a control. 可讓您在任何資料列中儲存格繪製之前手動調整資料列的外觀。 enables you to manually adjust the appearance of the row before any of the cells in the row are painted. 這非常有用，如果您想要自訂資料列，例如產生其中一個資料行的內容跨越多個資料行的資料列。This is useful if you want to customize the row, such as to produce a row where the content of one column spans multiple columns. 使用中的屬性取得資料列的設定，而不需要直接存取中的資料列。Use the properties in to get the settings of the row without directly accessing the row in the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件，以繪製自訂背景為選取的資料格。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event to draw a custom background for selected cells. 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#20)]

summary.span: 取得或設定需要重新繪製的 區域。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性代表的區域，需要重新繪製。The property represents the area of the that needs to be repainted. 例如，如果使用者涵蓋整個與另一個視窗，然後發現，代表整個。For example, if a user covers the entire with another window and then uncovers it, then represents the entire . 如果使用者涵蓋的範圍縮小，然後發現，表示所涵蓋的小型區域。If a user covers a small area of the and then uncovers it, then represents the small area that was covered. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，當您繪製和其儲存格內容自己。Use the method when you draw the and its cells' contents yourself. 如果您以手動方式繪製整個資料列和資料格的內容，請設定屬性`true`。If you manually paint the entire row and its cells' contents, set the property to `true`. 當是`true`、和事件不會發生。When is `true`, the and events do not occur. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法的資料列可見的資料格周圍繪製焦點。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to draw a focus around the visible cells of the row. 程式碼實際使用方法，幾乎完全相同方法。The code actually uses the method, which is nearly identical to the method of . 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含的資料列相同的值屬性。The property contains the same values as the row's property. 直接存取中可能會影響效能。Directly accessing a in the can affect performance. 使用中可避免取消共用該資料列，並維持最佳效能的事件。Use in the event to avoid unsharing the row and maintain optimal performance. 屬性是唯讀的。The property is read-only. 雖然您可以設定的屬性透過擷取屬性，新的設定沒有任何作用。Although you can set the properties of the retrieved through the property, the new settings will have no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來繪製所選取的資料列的自訂背景。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to paint a custom background for the selected row. 變數， `e`，屬於類型。The variable, `e`, is of type . 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 寬度屬性是相同的寬度。The width of the property is the same as the width of the . 若要取得中的資料行的寬度，使用方法。To get the width of the columns in the , use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來計算要繪製自訂背景的資料列範圍。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to calculate the bounds of the row to paint a custom background. 變數， `e`，屬於類型。The variable, `e`, is of type . 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料列索引可以用來存取目前的資料列內。The row index can be used to access the current row within a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來存取目前的資料列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the current row. 雖然程式碼實際使用屬性，這個屬性是幾乎完全相同屬性。Although the code actually uses the property, this property is nearly identical to the property of . 變數， `e`，屬於類型。The variable, `e`, is of type . 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以用來判斷是否在資料列遭到凍結時，唯讀的或已選取，還有其他狀態。This property can be used to determine whether the row is frozen, read-only, or selected, among other states. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否已選取一個資料列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether a row is selected. 如果選取的資料列，則程式碼繪製自訂背景。If the row is selected, the code paints a custom background. 變數， `e`，屬於類型。The variable, `e`, is of type . 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
